creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black and multicolored; 2 squares of heavily embroidered bands cover top and back; four 16-1/2" streamers down back; edge of black cap embroidered; edged with small, pointed metal discs on three sides; shell on end of front tab; 7" wax-dipped purple fringe on three sides
title: Child's Cap
